verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> mas-Sa The burden דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- of the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; for Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD נֹטֶ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> no-Teh which stretcheth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim forth the heavens וְיֹסֵ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> ve-yo-Sed and layeth the foundation אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz, of the earth וְיֹצֵ֥ר <S%H3335><s%> ve-yo-Tzer and formeth רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach- the spirit אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bo. within פ Peh

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אָ֠נֹכִי <S%H595><s%> 'A-no-chi I שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> sam Behold I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֧ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem סַף־ <S%H5592><s%> saf- a cup רַ֛עַל <S%H7478><s%> Ra-'al of trembling לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim unto all the people סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; round about וְגַ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam will also עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is against יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah both against Judah יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become בַמָּצ֖וֹר <S%H4692><s%> vam-ma-Tzor when they shall be in the siege עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- be against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. [and] against Jerusalem

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> vai-yom- And in that day הַ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> Ha-hu I אָשִׂ֨ים <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim will I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem אֶ֤בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stone מַֽעֲמָסָה֙ <S%H4614><s%> ma-'a-ma-Sah a burdensome לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, for all people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֹמְסֶ֖יהָ <S%H6006><s%> 'o-me-Sei-ha all that burden שָׂר֣וֹט <S%H8295><s%> sa-Rot will be severely יִשָּׂרֵ֑טוּ <S%H8295><s%> yis-sa-Re-tu; injured וְנֶאֶסְפ֣וּ <S%H622><s%> ve-ne-'es-Fu be gathered together עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, against כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol and all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> go-Yei though all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אַכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> 'ak-Keh I will smite כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every סוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> sus every horse בַּתִּמָּה֔וֹן <S%H8541><s%> bat-tim-ma-Hon, with astonishment וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <S%H7392><s%> ve-ro-che-Vo and his rider בַּשִּׁגָּע֑וֹן <S%H7697><s%> bash-shig-ga-'on; with madness וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- over בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> beit upon the house יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah אֶפְקַ֣ח <S%H6491><s%> 'ef-Kach and I will open אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai, mine eyes וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol every ס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> sus every horse הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, of the people אַכֶּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> 'ak-Keh and will smite בַּֽעִוָּרֽוֹן׃ <S%H5788><s%> Ba-'iv-va-Ron. with blindness

וְאָֽמְר֛וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru shall say אַלֻּפֵ֥י <S%H441><s%> 'al-lu-Fei And the governors יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בְּלִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bam; in their heart אַמְצָ֥ה <S%H556><s%> 'am-Tzah [shall be] my strength לִי֙ li יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei The inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem בַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. their God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu I אָשִׂים֩ <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim will I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַלֻּפֵ֨י <S%H441><s%> 'al-lu-Fei the governors יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah כְּֽכִיּ֧וֹר <S%H3595><s%> ke-chi-Yor like an hearth אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh of fire בְּעֵצִ֗ים <S%H6086><s%> be-'e-Tzim, among the wood וּכְלַפִּ֥יד <S%H3940><s%> u-che-lap-Pid and like a torch אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh of fire בְּעָמִ֔יר <S%H5995><s%> be-'a-Mir, in a sheaf וְאָ֨כְל֜וּ <S%H398><s%> ve-'A-che-Lu and they shall devour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יָמִ֧ין <S%H3225><s%> ya-Min on the right hand וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and on שְׂמֹ֛אול <S%H8040><s%> se-Mol and on the left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim all the people סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; round about וְיָשְׁבָ֨ה <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-she-Vah shall be inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim and Jerusalem ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again תַּחְתֶּ֖יהָ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-ha sites בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. again in her own place [even] in Jerusalem פ Peh

וְהוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <S%H3467><s%> ve-ho-Shi-a' also shall save יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָהֳלֵ֥י <S%H168><s%> 'o-ho-Lei the tents יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah; first לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תִגְדַּ֜ל <S%H1431><s%> tig-Dal do not magnify תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <S%H8597><s%> tif-'E-ret that the glory בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, of David וְתִפְאֶ֛רֶת <S%H8597><s%> ve-tif-'E-ret and the glory יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. [themselves] against Judah

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he יָגֵ֤ן <S%H1598><s%> ya-Gen defend יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh shall the LORD בְּעַד֙ <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad about יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become הַנִּכְשָׁ֥ל <S%H3782><s%> han-nich-Shal and he that is feeble בָּהֶ֛ם <S%H99999><s%> ba-Hem בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom among them at that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he כְּדָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> ke-da-Vid; shall be as David וּבֵ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> u-Veit and the house דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David כֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ke-lo-Him, [shall be] as God כְּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ke-mal-'Ach as the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem. before

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; I אֲבַקֵּ֗שׁ <S%H1245><s%> 'a-vak-Kesh, [that] I will seek לְהַשְׁמִיד֙ <S%H8045><s%> le-hash-Mid to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, all the nations הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im that come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. against Jerusalem

וְשָׁפַכְתִּי֩ <S%H8210><s%> ve-sha-fach-Ti And I will pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> beit upon the house דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al over יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev and upon the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach the spirit חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> chen of grace וְתַ֣חֲנוּנִ֔ים <S%H8469><s%> ve-Ta-cha-nu-Nim, and of supplications וְהִבִּ֥יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> ve-hib-Bi-tu and they shall look אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom דָּקָ֑רוּ <S%H1856><s%> da-Ka-ru; upon me whom they have pierced וְסָפְד֣וּ <S%H5594><s%> ve-sa-fe-Du for him as one mourneth עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, over כְּמִסְפֵּד֙ <S%H5594><s%> ke-mis-Ped mourns עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַיָּחִ֔יד <S%H3173><s%> hai-ya-Chid, for [his] only וְהָמֵ֥ר <S%H4843><s%> ve-ha-Mer [son] and shall be in bitterness עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over כְּהָמֵ֥ר <S%H4843><s%> ke-ha-Mer for him as one that is in bitterness עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor. for [his] firstborn

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he יִגְדַּ֤ל <S%H1431><s%> yig-Dal shall there be a great הַמִּסְפֵּד֙ <S%H4553><s%> ham-mis-Ped mourning בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-Ru-sha-Lim, in Jerusalem כְּמִסְפַּ֥ד <S%H4553><s%> ke-mis-Pad as the mourning הֲדַדְ־ ha-dad- רִמּ֖וֹן <S%H1910><s%> rim-Mon of Hadadrimmon בְּבִקְעַ֥ת <S%H1237><s%> be-vik-'At in the valley מְגִדּֽוֹן׃ <S%H4023><s%> me-gid-Don. of Megiddon

וְסָפְדָ֣ה <S%H5594><s%> ve-sa-fe-Dah shall mourn הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, And the land מִשְׁפָּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pa-Chot every מִשְׁפָּח֖וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pa-Chot family לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad; apart מִשְׁפַּ֨חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David לְבָד֙ <S%H905><s%> le-Vad itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֣ם <S%H802><s%> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad, themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat apart the family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house נָתָן֙ <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan of Nathan לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad, itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <S%H905><s%> le-Vad. themselves

מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat The family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house לֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad, itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad; themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat apart the family הַשִּׁמְעִי֙ <S%H8097><s%> hash-shim-'I of Shimei לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad, itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <S%H905><s%> le-Vad. themselves

כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> Kol, all הַמִּשְׁפָּחוֹת֙ <S%H4940><s%> ham-mish-pa-chOt All the families הַנִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'a-Rot, that remain מִשְׁפָּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pa-Chot every family מִשְׁפָּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pa-Chot family לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad; itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> u-ne-shei-Hem apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <S%H905><s%> le-Vad. themselves ס sa-Mek
